### useR! Conference

<h3>useR! Conference - Salzburg 2024</h3>

![useR! Conference - Salzburg 2024](./Conferences/Resources/UseR-24-Event-LaunchAssets-v2_cfp-632x84.png)

The **useR! conference** is an annual event organized by volunteers from the R community and supported by the R Foundation. It showcases the latest applications and developments in R, a popular programming language for statistical computing and graphics. The conference features a variety of activities, including keynote speeches, technical talks, workshops, and poster sessions¹.

The next useR! conference will be held from **July 8th to 11th, 2024**, in **Salzburg, Austria**, with virtual participation options available¹. It's a great opportunity for R users, developers, data scientists, and statisticians from academia and industry to network, share knowledge, and learn about the latest advancements in R.

Are you interested in attending or learning more about R programming?
